rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0001
rows.name:
So, it seems you are preparing
for the final battle.

rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0002
rows.name:
You, who unraveled the mysteries of
Captain Nopopon, surely cannot fail.

rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0004
rows.name: The future of Alst is in your hands!

rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Wahey! Rododo manage to say
whole thing in ancient Nopon style!

rows.label: tlk42300013_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Urk?! Rododo just slip back into
modern Nopon style again...
